channel.title: Vocal requests accepted now! Mic is working again!
channel.description:
I already have a list, but I can add to it if needed. For the time being, since there is a list, I might be charging about $10 a track. Something cheap so if you dont like it, you wont feel cheated. And I know most of you don’t work, so I apologize but the price may drop in the near future. Hopefully, I can get some money though. Who’s up?
[EDIT] Due to popular demand, I shall not charge for vocals. Just ask, and you shall recieve. Do keep in mind, I have a list of people I'm doing vocals for, so I may not get to you immediately

item.title: Vocal requests accepted now! Mic is working again!
item.dc:creator: NickElle
item.description:
Okay, it’s up to you.

Read full topic
item.source: Vocal requests accepted now! Mic is working again!

item.title: Vocal requests accepted now! Mic is working again!
item.dc:creator: NickElle
item.description:
Bro, I think you should charge.
You are providing a service that many EDM producers don’t have: words.

I mean, you don’t have to charge all the time, and if you do charge, you don’t have to charge that much.

Read full topic
